```{r, echo=F, warning=F, message=F}
library(raster)
library(dplyr)
library(sf)
library(leaflet)

```


```{r, echo=FALSE}
colz<-read_sf('C:/seabirds/data/GIS/parks_gbr_cols.shp')

m <- leaflet(colz) %>%
  addTiles() %>% 
  addCircleMarkers( popup= paste("Site:", colz$site_nm , "<br>", "species:", colz$species), stroke=F, radius=6, fillOpacity = 0.5)
   
m     
```
